data.eml:eml: Pheidole in the New World. A dominant, hyperdiverse ant genus.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book / thesis / monograph Wilson, E. O. (2003): Pheidole in the New World. A dominant, hyperdiverse ant genus. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, URL: http://atbi.biosci.ohio-state.edu/HymOnline/reference-full.html?id=20017
